item.title: JetBrains AI Assistant 2024.2: Improved Code Completion, Smarter Chat, and More AI Features
item.description: The new and improved AI Assistant for the 2024.2 versions of JetBrains IDEs is now out, featuring smarter and faster AI code completion for Java, Kotlin, and Python; an enhanced UX when working with code in the editor; AI functionality for Git conflict resolution, in-terminal code generation, new customizable prompts, improved test generation, and more. [â€¦] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/ai/2024/08/jetbrains-ai-assistant-2024-2/

item.title: TeamCity 2024.07.1 Bug Fix Is Out
item.description: The 2024.07.1 bug fix for TeamCity On-Premises is now available for download!Â This bug fix update resolves over 30 issues, including failing Maven builds in containers, agent Windows services not locating the bundled JRE, new licensing mechanism problems, and more. item.title: dotInsights | August 2024
item.description: Did you know? In 1936, Russian engineer Vladimir Lukyanov built a mechanical computer known as a Water Integrator that carefully manipulated water in a room full of interconnected pipes and pumps. The water level in various chambers represented stored numbers, and the computer could solve complex mathematical equations. Iâ€™m sure the last thing Vladimir wanted [â€¦] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/dotnet/2024/08/01/dotinsights-august-2024/

item.title: CLion 2024.2 Release Candidate

To install CLion 2024.2 RC (build 242.20224.214), download it from our website, update via the Toolbox App, or use this snap package (for Ubuntu). item.title: Code Quality: Leadership Strategies for Finding and Supporting Quality-Focused Developers
item.description: Why is prioritizing code quality so important? One of the greatest challenges leaders face is balancing culture, competency, and potential in order to grow teams [â€¦] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/qodana/2024/07/leadership-code-quality/
